attributes.action: , with the exception of medical emergencies, make it a criminal offence punishable by imprisonment for Members of Parliament and voting members of the upper house to travel by any means other than public transport using the standard class accommodation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The unpleasantness, expense, inconvenience and insecurity of public transport will never be sorted out while those who make the decisions about it can avoid using it.  Once MPs have to suffer along with the rest they will finally take notice and do something about sorting out our terrible public transport system.
